A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
+ Some great effects and battle scenes
+ For the most part\, Leia was great
+ Daisy Ridley's acting and characterisation

- basic plot based around the opening crawl (first order is chasing the rebels) that has a lot of subplots but doesn't go much further
- The Snoke character is irrelevant
- Luke Skywalker is irrelevant\, and mediocre.
- Every effort has been made to move away from the previous story/lore which again\, results in mediocrity. 

Not really sure where they go from here. I guess that they could add Lando in\, and then kill him off too.
